titleInfo.title: Comardelle v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: Minute Order. Proceedings held before Magistrate Judge Michael North: Motion Hearing held on 10/29/2014 re 335 MOTION to Compel Deposition of Danny Joyce, or, in the Alternative, to Strike Danny Joyce as a Witness, 334 MOTION To Permit Danny Joyce's Deposition to be Taken after the Depositions of GE, Foster Wheeler and CBS, 353 MOTION to Quash 30(b)(6) Deposition, 340 MOTION to Compel 30(b)(6) Deposition of Avondale. (Court Reporter Karen Ibos.) (lag)

titleInfo.title: Comardelle v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER AND REASONS re 245 MOTION for Partial Summary Judgment on Plaintiffs' Claim for Lejeune Damages and 254 MOTION for Partial Summary Judgment on Plaintiffs' Claims for Lejeune Damages; ORDERED that the motions are GRANTED and that plaintiffs' claims for Lejeune damages are DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE. Signed by Judge Lance M Africk on 10/31/2014.(blg)

titleInfo.title: Comardelle v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER re 502 MOTION for APPEAL OF MAGISTRATE JUDGE DECISION to District Court: ORDERED that the 567 motion filed by plaintiffs for leave to file a reply memorandum is GRANTED. FURTHER ORDERED that the orders of the U.S. Magistrate Judge are AFFIRMED. Signed by Judge Lance M Africk on 12/9/2014. (blg)

titleInfo.title: Comardelle v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER re 565 MOTION for APPEAL OF MAGISTRATE JUDGE DECISION to District Court; ORDERED that the 566 motion for an expedited hearing is GRANTED. FURTHER ORDERED that, to the extent that plaintiffs seek review of the U.S. Magistrate Judge's order regarding their motion to quash Ray Comardelle's deposition, the appeal is DISMISSED AS MOOT. FURTHER ORDERED that the order of the U.S. Magistrate Judge is AFFIRMED in all other respects. Signed by Judge Lance M Africk on 12/10/2014. (blg)

titleInfo.title: Comardelle v. Pennsylvania General Insurance Company et al
titleInfo.subTitle: ORDER AND REASONS: ORDERED that the 386, 391, 393 motions for summary judgment are GRANTED. Plaintiffs' claims and the Avondale Interests' crossclaims for virile share contributions against defendant, P2S, LLC, are DISMISSED WITH PREJUDICE. FURTHER ORDERED that the 402 alternative motion for partial summary judgment is DISMISSED AS MOOT. Signed by Judge Lance M Africk on 12/15/2014.(blg)
